groups.name: spring.python.executor.process
groups.description: Configuration properties for the process-based Python executor.

properties.name: spring.python.executor.process.start-command
properties.description: The base command used to start the Python interpreter process.

properties.name: spring.python.executor.process.loggable
properties.description: Whether process execution details (input, output, errors) should be logged.

properties.name: spring.python.executor.process.result-appearance
properties.description: Defines the variable name of the result to be returned to the Java side.
